attributes.action: introduce the subject of Government and Politics into the National Curriculum for 11-16 year olds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government and Politics needs to be introduced into Key Stages 3 and 4 in order to give young people a better understanding of different political ideas along with the political systems in both this country and others, and how the former can influence the latter.
